channel.title: INDIR3CT [WIP, Project, Feedback wanted]
channel.description:
Hey everyone! I’ve been working on a trap song recently. I’ve gotten in contact with some Lowly Palace admins and told them about Auxy. I would like to get this track done and submit it to them, and Trap nation. But, I need some help with it. If anyone would like to take a listen, and add some feedback, it would help tremendously.
Thanks! https://app.auxy.co/projects/B0jug0VfFo6YQrZ0teB-MA==
P.s. this is totally a work in progress. It has a good way to go :stuck_out_tongue:

item.title: INDIR3CT [WIP, Project, Feedback wanted]
item.dc:creator: therealejoc
item.description:
Oh mama that’s schmexy. I would maybe add some sort of isolation before the drop of something to separate it a bit but once again that personal preference. It sounds super awesome though! I could tell you spent a lot of time on it!

Read full topic

item.title: INDIR3CT [WIP, Project, Feedback wanted]
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
Worked on it all day. Waddya think?
https://app.auxy.co/projects/PP76P4AQCO75r3R94LqmEA==

Read full topic

item.title: INDIR3CT [WIP, Project, Feedback wanted]
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
Thanks for the feedback! I do have high hats there, but they are very quiet. I’ll make those louder. Also, I can knock 16 bars out of the build up so its more balanced and fast paced.

Read full topic

item.title: INDIR3CT [WIP, Project, Feedback wanted]
item.dc:creator: therealejoc
item.description:
Dope! One thing I noticed is you don’t have any hi-hats. Not technically a rule that you have to have them, I just like hihats lol. Also, the buildup seems a little drawn out. I got bored after a while because it didn’t build fast enough. Just my opinion

Read full topic

item.title: INDIR3CT [WIP, Project, Feedback wanted]
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
I have to agree with @therealejoc. I trust that you will do this in the drop. From what I’ve heard, it’s pretty good.

Read full topic

item.title: INDIR3CT [WIP, Project, Feedback wanted]

item.description:

item.title: INDIR3CT [WIP, Project, Feedback wanted]
item.dc:creator: therealejoc
item.description:
Sounds petty fuego so far. Maybe advance the drums a bit. Like make them more complex as it progresses. But it’s all up to you and what style you’re going for
